comments.text:
When the position of the thumb is updated, the thumb jumps immediately to the new position.

The thumb should instead transition smoothly to the new position.

comments.text:
I don't think this will be a simple bug to fix. The timeline uses a XUL scale element, and the change of position within a scale element looks to happen here, within DoLayout, http://mxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/layout/xul/base/src/nsSliderFrame.cpp#333

It doesn't look like CSS transitions can be used here, at least not without a bit of setup work first.
